code: function fixed(num){var count=Number(num).toFixed(2);var countfix=Number(num).toFixed(0);var len=countfix.toString();if(len.length>6&&len.length<10){count=countfix/1e6;count=Number(count).toFixed(2);count="".concat(count,"m");}if(len.length>9){count=countfix/1e9;count=Number(count).toFixed(2);count="".concat(count,"b");}return count;}export default fixed;
